Asignación de tipos de medios a cada fil: Associate firefighting means to resource dispatch philosophy
Calcular cambio neto en el valor de los: Calculate net change in the value of resources
Definición de opciones de ejecución y as: Definition of run options and associate firefighting means to run options
Descripción calibración: Fires history, prepare calibration and run calibration
El número de recursos asignados finalmen: El número de recursos asignados finalmente a cada Nivel de Intensidad es acumulativo, es decir, es la suma de los incrementos especificados en los Niveles de                  Intensidades iguales o inferiores.
The number of resources finally assigned to each intensity level is acumulative. it is the sum of the increments specified in the same or lower Intensity Levels.
Generar tabla de intensidades de activac: Generate intensity level table data of firefighting means
Generar tabla maestra de recursos y edit: Generate and edit master table of resources
Grupo de cálculo de cambio neto en el va: Net change group in the value of resources
Número horas transcurridas al declararse: Hours after the time that the fire is declared escaped:
Tabla de intensidades de medios generada: Intensity level table data of firefighting means generated
asignacionMediosHelpText:
This window gives the option of removing the firefighting means defined in the system for each of the execution options defined. To do this, the maximum budget of each option is shown, as well as the budget that we have used and the one that remains available.

The number of resources assigned to each category should be in accordance with the maximum number of resources allocated in each resource dispatch philosophy. Thus, if in the resource dispatch philosophy we indicate a maximum of 3 support groups, it would not be logical to assign more than 3 support groups to the options that use said resource dispatch philosophy.
definirOpcionesHelpText: Through these options, the combat strategies are defined, by assigning resource dispatch philosophies to each representative place and establishing the global budget, as well as by indicating the firefighting means available in each strategy.
ejecutarSimulacionHelpText:
This window gives the option of run the model implemented in the program. It is recommended to previously generate the different necessary internal tables, from the menu options Calculate net change in the value of resources, Master resource table and Generate table of activation intensities for firefighting means.

For execution, at least one ZAMIF, one Execution Option and one Fire Behavior Data Group must be selected.
filosofiaDataHelpText:
These are based on the combination of firefighting means according to each of the six fire intensity levels.

The values ​​that must be entered for each dispatch philosophy are:

  • Identification code of the dispatch philosophy,
  • Description of the dispatch philosophy (consisting in its name) and
  • additional text in relation to the characterization of the dispatch philosophy
For each category of firefighting means defined, the increase of firefighting means for each level of intensity of the fire that has been considered in that dispatch philosophy.
filosofiaHelpText: With the resource dispatch philosophies option, a screen is accessed that allows the user to insert different combat strategy options.
